overview:
Dave has been friends with Gaz since University. He is the Technical Director for GreenLight, and is responsible for the website build, database design, and technical infrastructure. He currently works in the London financial services industry as a Release & Environment Manager.

 10 years of IT, Development & Systems Management experience  Expert in Ruby on Rails, Javascript, jQuery, HTML5 and CSS, Linux Infrastructure, MySQL and NoSQL  Vast experience of application development  Vast experience of change management, particularly in relation to ITIL best practise  Active member of the Ruby on Rails community
